channel.title: Project Xml Banner!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just purchased Vbulletin and I wanted a banner for my website and to use to advertise my server with. If someone could please make me a banner that would suite green fox vbulletin I would love you
Things I Would Like: 1) I want the pic to show the name "Project-Xml" 2) I want it to look awesome, and suite the green fox skin. 3) I want it to redirect to my forums www.project-xml.com 4) I want it to be a pic of like people pking or npcs. 5) I will vouch for you if you can do it for me.
Thanks guys, can you add me on skype if you can Booga464
